channel.title: Embedded on Donia Chaiehloudj
channel.description: Recent content in Embedded on Donia Chaiehloudj

item.title: Mastering Hardware Programming, Go, & Networking in Embedded Systems
item.description: Discussing my journey in hardware programming, why Go is a game-changer for embedded development, and tackling networking challenges in IoT.

item.title: TinyGo Adventures
item.description: Exploring TinyGo for microcontrollers - from learning experiments to the Tiny Hen project monitoring my hen house, presented at multiple GopherCons.
